text: Among the many topics explored in the newest episode of “ My Next Guest Needs No Introduction, ” Jay - Z opened up to David Letterman about infidelity in his marriage with Beyonce, thoughts on Donald Trump and his relationship with Kanye West. Letterman ( who had his own cheating scandal with members of his “ Late Show ” staff ) talked about his journey to be being a better husband, to which Jay - Z responded, “ For a lot of us – especially where I grew up, and [ for ] men in general – we don ’ t have emotional cues.
